title: PyReduce Instrument Settings
description: Keywords that need to be set for the PyReduce to sort files correctly and interpret the header

__instrument__.description: Meta data, for which instrument this file is designed

instrument.description: keyword for the instrument in the header

id_instrument.description: Value of the instrument keyword, can be regex

telescope.description: keyword for the telescope in the header

target.description: keyword of the target in the header

date.description: keyword of the datetime in the header

date_format.description: format of the datetime in the header, e.g. fits (default), or mjd

extension.description: the extension of the fits file to use to access the data

orientation.description: the orientation of the input files, equal to the number of 90 degree flips necessary

prescan_x.description: The horizontal prescan direction, before orientation, or the keyword that contains that value

overscan_x.description: The overscan in horizontal direction, before orientation, or the keyword that contains that value

prescan_y.description: The vertical prescan direction, before orientation, or the keyword that contains that value

overscan_y.description: The overscan in vertical direction, before orientation, or the keyword that contains that value

naxis_x.description: The size of the horizontal axis

naxis_y.description: The size of the vertical axis

dark.description: The dark current of the instrument

sky.description: The sky background of the instrument

exposure_time.description: The keyword for the exposure time in seconds of the observation

ra.description: The keyword for the right acension of the observation

dec.description: The keyword for the declination of the observation

longitude.description: The longitude of the telescope on earth

latitude.description: The latitude of the telescope on earth

altitude.description: The altitude of the telescope on earth

kw_bias.description: The keyword that identifies the bias files

kw_flat.description: The keyword that identifies the flat files

kw_curvature.description: The keyword that identifies the curvature files

kw_scatter.description: The keyword that identifies the background scatter files

kw_orders.description: The keyword that identifies the order definition files

kw_wave.description: The keyword that identifies the wavecal files

kw_comb.description: The keyword that identifies the laser frequency comb / fabry perot interferometer files

kw_spec.description: The keyword that identifies the science files

id_bias.description: The value that identifies the bias files

id_flat.description: The value that identifies the flat files

id_curvature.description: The value that identifies the curvature files

id_scatter.description: The value that identifies the background scatter files

id_orders.description: The value that identifies the order definition files

id_wave.description: The value that identifies the wavecal files

id_comb.description: The value that identifies the laser frequency comb / fabry perot interferometer files

id_spec.description: The value that identifies the science files
